item.title: Launch of the new journal ACM Transactions on Recommender Systems (TORS)
item.description: Today, the new journal ACM Transactions on Recommender Systems (TORS) has launched its website and is ready to accept submissions. I am proud to be on the Editorial Board from the journal’s very beginning. I will serve as an Associate Editor and I am looking forward to many submissions and new insights into the field of recommender systems.
